headline: The Bull Case For Intuitive Surgical (ISRG) Could Change Following An Earnings Beat Fueled By Robotic Adoption
summary: In the past quarter, Intuitive Surgical reported stronger-than-expected results, with revenue and earnings surpassing forecasts as hospitals accelerated adoption of its da Vinci and Ion robotic-assisted surgery platforms. This performance highlights how Intuitive’s expanding installed base and growing procedure volumes are reinforcing the company’s position as a leading provider of minimally invasive surgical technology worldwide. We’ll now examine how this earnings beat and accelerating da...

headline: CARL Launches Aprevo Cervical Platform for Personalized Spine Surgery
summary: Carlsmed launches personalized aprevo cervical platform with early cases and new reimbursement support driving momentum in spine surgery.
